About this Item

First edition, first impression of Aldiss's first SF novel and 3rd book. This has the maroon covers of the first issue. The book is solid and tight and the gold lettering on the spine is bright. But there was a liquid splashed on the foredge with very minor penetration into the pages. The endpapers have light foxing. A gift inscription on the FFEP date 5/17/1958. Top edge has dust staining. The price clipped DJ is complete but has a lot of edge wear, spotting, darkening to the spine and interior foxing. A chance to own this very scarce book in DJ at an affordable price.
